label: twoPairs
rule: ∃(A,B,C,D: A = B ^ C = D, R1,R2,R3,R4,R5) |= twoPairs

label: tris
rule: ∃(A,B,C: A = B ^ A = C, R1,R2,R3,R4,R5) -> X |= tris

label: straight
rule: V(A: ∃(B: A + 1 = B, R1,R2,R3,R4,R5), R1,R2,R3,R4,R5) -> X |= straight

label: flush
rule: S1 = S2 ^ S1 = S3 ^ S1 = S4 ^ S1 = S5 -> X |= flush

label: full
rule: ∃(A,B,C,D,E: A = B = C ^ D = E, R1,R2,R3,R4,R5)

label: straightFlush
rule: V(A: ∃(B: A + 1 = B, R1,R2,R3,R4,R5), R1,R2,R3,R4,R5) ^ (S1 = S2 ^ S1 = S3 ^ S1 = S4 ^ S1 = S5) -> X |= straightFlush
